column5: Great private room in a townhouse located in East Downtown (EaDo) Houston. Walking access to Minute Maid baseball stadium, BBVA Compass soccer stadium, and EaDo nightlife scene. Short taxi/uber ride to Toyota basketball stadium. About 7 min walk to light rail station, with access to downtown main street nightlife scene, midtown nightlife scene, medical district, and NRG football stadium.   All are welcome. Great for visitors and business travelers.
column8: Spacious EaDo Guest Room in Beautiful Townhouse
